And behold, there was a pale green horse! The name of its rider was Death, and Hades followed him. 6:8 He was ¦ They were CT TRHe was given authority over a fourth of the earth to kill by the sword, famine, pestilence, and by the wild beasts of the earth.

When the Lamb opened the fifth seal, I saw under the altar the souls of 6:9 those 61.6% ¦ the people BYZ PCK 37.3%those who had been slain because of the word of God and because of the testimony 6:9 of the Lamb ¦ --- CT TRof the Lamb which they had upheld.

Then I watched as the Lamb opened the sixth seal, 6:12 and ¦ and behold, TRand there was a great earthquake. The sun became as black as sackcloth made of goat hair, the 6:12 entire ¦ --- BYZ PCK TRentire moon became like blood,
and the stars of the sky fell to the earth like a fig tree dropping its unripe figs when it is shaken by a strong wind.
The sky was split apart like a scroll being rolled up, and every mountain and island was removed from its place.

Then the kings of the earth, the magnates, the 6:15 commanders, the rich ¦ rich, the commanders TRcommanders, the rich, the mighty, and every slave and 6:15 free ¦ every free Αν BYZ PCK TRfree man hid themselves in the caves and among the rocks of the mountains.
